pathways_premium.name: Apex Predator
pathways_premium.description: Full Legendary Tier Skinner Tyrant Armor Set, Max Level and Lots of new starting toys to start enjoying the world when skipping the prologue, Includes 5 Legendary weapons, along with a new Legendary Crossbow and Bow, A Legendary Tier custom paraglider that can be equiped to boost your current paraglider, $25000 starting cash, several potions, crafting items, grenades and other explosives, and crafting mods.
